messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1778
messages.msgSnippet: Only on Sundays when we go to church at 8:00am. The oldest sets her alarm for about 8 because her
messages.messageBody:
<<Do you wake them up in the morning at a certain time>>

Only on Sundays when we go to church at 8:00am.

The oldest sets her alarm for about 8 because her goats get very loud
wanting to be fed. All the other kids wake up naturally between 6:30 and
8:00.

Julie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1778
messages.msgSnippet: The thread may be old to you.  I was responding to post that came through my digest since the last time I checked all my digests
messages.messageBody:
<<Give it a rest please>>

The thread may be old to you. I was responding to post that came through my
digest since the last time I checked all my digests which was yesterday. I
don't know how you receive your mails.

I was not talking about Bridget. I was making a generalization. It is my
understanding that several people have talked quite recently on this list
about perceiving their children having difficulty controlling their behavior
in regards to television, computer games, etc..

Yes, I know all about Bridget. I have been on this list since before she
showed up. Again, I was not talking about any one person on this list, but
about behaviors in general.

Julie
